original_title: UB Finance signs MOU with St. Thomas’ College
original_body_lines: UB Finance, which is amongst the highest-capitalized finance companies in Sri Lanka signed an MOU with S. Thomas’ College Mount Lavinia recently. The Company prides itself on delivering a unique customer experience supported by an extensive portfolio of financial products. The MOU aims to Power the STC Basketball Teams of all age groups for a period of three years commencing from January 2023. This initiative comes on the backdrop of a promising season in 2022, spearheaded by the senior team which boasts of eleven coloursmen for the upcoming season.
